trans-unit.resname: PHTR·1 | Chandra, Gremlin Wrangler | Card Name
PHTR·1 | Chandra, Gremlin Wrangler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Create a 2/2 red Gremlin creature token.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Create a 2/2 red Gremlin creature token.

trans-unit.resname: PHTR·1 | Chandra, Gremlin Wrangler | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−2]: CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of Gremlins you control.
trans-unit.target: [−2]: CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of Gremlins you control.

trans-unit.resname: PHTR·1 | Chandra, Gremlin Wrangler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Sure, I could set things on fire by myself. But teamwork can be fun, too."
trans-unit.target: "Sure, I could set things on fire by myself. But teamwork can be fun, too."

trans-unit.resname: PHTR·2 | Dungeon Master | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Target opponent creates a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token with "When this creature dies, each opponent gains 2 life."
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Target opponent creates a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token with "When this creature dies, each opponent gains 2 life."

trans-unit.resname: PHTR·2 | Dungeon Master | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Roll a d20. If you roll a 1, skip your next turn. If you roll a 12 or higher, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Roll a d20. If you roll a 1, skip your next turn. If you roll a 12 or higher, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: PHTR·2 | Dungeon Master | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−6]: You get an adventuring party. (Your party is a 3/3 red Fighter with first strike, a 1/1 white Cleric with lifelink, a 2/2 black Rogue with hexproof, and a 1/1 blue Wizard with flying.)
trans-unit.target: [−6]: You get an adventuring party. (Your party is a 3/3 red Fighter with first strike, a 1/1 white Cleric with lifelink, a 2/2 black Rogue with hexproof, and a 1/1 blue Wizard with flying.)

trans-unit.resname: PHTR·3 | Nira, Hellkite Duelist | Card Name
PHTR·3 | Nira, Hellkite Duelist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PHTR·3 | Nira, Hellkite Duelist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
PHTR·3 | Nira, Hellkite Duelist | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, the next time you would lose the game this turn, instead draw three cards and your life total becomes 5.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, the next time you would lose the game this turn, instead draw three cards and your life total becomes 5.

trans-unit.resname: PHTR·3 | Nira, Hellkite Duelist | Flavor Text
